abstract: Qassim Suleimani’s death brought vindication for the many American lives he took over the years. But what comes next?
lead_paragraph: Was the killing of Maj. Gen. Qassim Suleimani, commander of Iran’s elite Quds Force, an act of war? If it was, it was a war in which the United States and Iran were already joined.
keywords: United States Defense and Military Forces
